games.name: Clockwork Beetles
games.description: Repair beetles in this Steampunk-themed Match3 game and earn as many points as possible within the given time!

games.name: Fruit Break
games.description: It's Fruit Break time! Prove your skills in 60 seconds: cut as many fruits as possible and avoid all bombs. Will you beat the high score?

games.name: Hop Don't Stop
games.description: Hop don't stop is an addicting skill game full of diamonds, power ups, obstacles, abysses and a cute little bunny. Swipe, duck and jump to run as far as possible, collect diamonds to upgrade your skills in the shop and use power ups to go much farther than any bunny before.

games.name: Tabby Island
games.description: In this adorable match3 game your task is to combine as many cute little kittens as possible. Each time you match more than 3 kittens, the last one gets super powers! Off to next adventures on Tabby Island!

games.name: Ultimate Boxing
games.description: In Ultimate Boxing awaits you a hard fight. Get in the ring and prove your skills!

games.name: Formula Fever
games.description: Race against opponents, earn prize money and unlock cool new cars and various tracks! Compete with players all over the world for the best lap times and try to become champion of all tracks!

games.name: Fast Food Takeaway
games.description: In this fun management and skill game, you play as the owner of a small food cart. Expand your business, make a name for yourself and become the next fast food superstar!

games.name: Treasure Hunt
games.description: In Treasure Hunt lots of challenging match3 levels await you. Combine three or more crystals to achieve the objectives of every level and you will find the epic treasure at the end of the game.

games.name: Hiddentastic Mansion
games.description: Help Emma in this Hidden Object game to earn money to renovate the old mansion she has inherited. Find antiques and other objects in 5 exciting locations and sell them to make the old estate shine again!

games.name: Juicy Dash
games.description: Prove your skills in this addictive match3 game. Match as many fruits as possible and beat the high score!

games.name: Animal Quiz
games.description: In this free quiz you can test your knowledge about animals in more than 300 levels. Look at the picture in each level and guess the correct name!

games.name: Fashion Yo!!
games.description: Become a trendy fashion designer and create your own collection! Style your mannequins and present your awesome outfits in your show room. Play mini games to earn money, buy new items and unlock all achievements!

games.name: Snowball World
games.description: In this skill game your aim is to help the little kitten Snowball. Jump over obstacles, catch mice and birds and collect keys to complete 20 challenging levels!

games.name: Cutie's Kitty Rescue
games.description: Help Cutie run a cat rescue shelter in this adorable management game! Treat cats, feed them and play with them before releasing them into a new home.

games.name: Lectro
games.description: Lectro is a minimalist game which demands your whole attention and skills. Move from one dot to the next and beat the high score!

games.name: Amazing Me
games.description: Design your own business card and find out what it reveals about your character in this fun makeover and personality game!

games.name: Movie Quiz
games.description: Are you interested in movies? Play the game and test your knowledge! How many movies can you guess correctly?

games.name: Key & Shield
games.description: In the platform adventure Key&Shield you take on the role of Buddy, a yellow blob who tries to rescue his friends. Run, jump and fly through challenging levels and defeat all enemies!

games.name: Taptastic Monsters
games.description: Tap to win! Fight against monsters, earn gold and upgrade your heroes to beat as many levels as possible in this addictive clicker game!

games.name: Creamy Ice
games.description: Build your own ice cream empire in this cool skill game! Serve customers by tapping the ingredients in the correct order and upgrade your business. How many days can you complete?

games.name: Cut It!
games.description: Cut It! is the perfect puzzle game for everyone who likes to give their brain a workout! Use your logical skills and cut the wood into pieces of equal size. Master all levels and collect all the stars!

games.name: Sushi Ninja Dash
games.description: Jump with the cute ninjas from wall to wall, collect sushi and avoid dangerous obstacles. Are your ready for the challenge?

games.name: Fluffy Egg
games.description: Choose the pictures you like best and find out what kind of egg you are in this weirdly fun personality quiz!

games.name: Purple Mole
games.description: Moley the Purple Mole has to rescue the princess and you need help him in this cute puzzle platformer! Prove your skills in 20 challenging levels and free the princess!

games.name: My Puppy
games.description: Make your own, cute puppy by matching different features such as color and pattern of fur and shape and size of nose and ears. The wide range of possibilities allows you to be creative for hours and create as many dogs as you like.

games.name: Street Ball Star
games.description: Become a living street basketball legend! In this retro sports game your aim is to score as many baskets as possible. Collect coins, earn gifts and unlock new objects and locations!

games.name: Rain Forest Hunter
games.description: Let's visit an imaginative rain forest and go hunting! Shoot cute flying piggies, fish and coins as fast as you can to get as many coins as possible!

games.name: All-Star Basketball Quiz
games.description: Can you recognize all basketball stars? Test your knowledge in this fun quiz game and guess all the players correctly! How many levels can you solve?

games.name: Bravebull Pirates
games.description: In Bravebull Pirates your aim is to free Bull's sweetheart from the evil pirates. Solve every level as fast as you can and help the couple to reunite!

games.name: Wanderlust
games.description: All hands on deck! Wanderlust is an exciting high sea adventure. As a fearless pirate captain you will fight on high seas, collect treasures and undertake daring missions.

games.name: Medieval Life
games.description: Once upon a time...In this cute puzzle game your task is to find the true ending for the story. Tap the buttons in the correct order and grow each story part to their maximum level!

games.name: Boss Level Shootout
games.description: Fire missiles, collect power ups and upgrade your skills to beat all bosses in this addicting retro action game!

games.name: K.U.L.I.
games.description: Dive into a post-apocalyptic world and battle your way through many dangerous levels in this action packed zombie shooter!

games.name: Woodventure
games.description: Woodventure takes you on a journey through a magical forest full of cute animals. Your task in this classic Mahjong connect game is to find pairs and remove all animals from the playing field.

games.name: Orange Bubbles
games.description: Shoot the bubbles and combine at least 3 of the same color to remove them from the field. Drop the oranges to complete a level. How many fruits can you harvest?

games.name: Treasure Link
games.description: Discover a fantastic underwater world! Find pairs of sea creatures and remove all tiles from the field in this cute Mahjong connect game!

games.name: Anime Manga Quiz
games.description: Test you knowledge of Japanese Manga culture and solve more than 200 fun levels!

games.name: Babel
games.description: Show your skills and build the tallest tower in the world in this fun arcade game!

games.name: Blue Box
games.description: Blue Box is a unique and minimalist logic game in which your goal is to transport the blue box from the green start to the red box.

games.name: Jetpack Master
games.description: Jetpack Master is a cool action arcade game with the handsome hero Jeff Powers.

games.name: Mixed World
games.description: Visit Mixed World and help tiny blue monsters to defend themselves against red villains. Push all red monsters off the platform and master 30 challenging levels.

games.name: Soccertastic
games.description: Swipe the ball and try different techniques to score as many goals as possible in this soccertastic penalty game!

games.name: Bananamania
games.description: Feed the gorillas with bananas in this challenging skill game and be careful not to miss! How many points can you earn before you rage quit?

games.name: My Dolphin Show 6
games.description: Play as a dolphin in this cute skill game and impress the audience with your spectacular stunts!

games.name: Mini Race Rush
games.description: Mini Race Rush is an exciting action game, collect as many stars as you can, gather power ups to destroy your enemies and run the race for a new highscore

games.name: Burger Maker
games.description: Be a true Burger King! Take orders and create yummy hamburgers as fast as you can!

games.name: Fire Truck
games.description: Use your logical thinking and move the cars, so the fire truck can leave the parking lot!

games.name: Monster Snack Time
games.description: It's snack time in monster land! Kill or be killed - can you beat all 40 levels?

games.name: Back To Candyland - Episode 4
games.description: All good things come in four! In this new match3 journey you will visit the lollipop garden

games.name: Power Mahjong: The Tower
games.description: Find matching tiles and clear as many layers as possible in this cool Mahjong game version!

games.name: Kiba & Kumba Puzzle
games.description: This is our newest Kiba&Kumba game! 30 challenging puzzle levels are waiting for you.

games.name: Princess Goldblade And The Dangerous Water
games.description: Princess Goldblade needs to watch out for the dangers that are awaiting her in the waters. Help her to beat them in this colorful jump 'n' run game!

games.name: Power Mahjong: The Journey
games.description: Accompany the giant panda on his journey through 25 fun mahjong levels. Can you earn all stars?

games.name: Zombies Eat My Stocking
games.description: Defend yourself against stocking eating zombies in this fun and addictive fighting game!

games.name: Angry Necromancer
games.description: The necromancer needs help! Defend the tower against zombies with your destroying spells.

games.name: Snap The Shape: Japan
games.description: Snap The Shape Japan is the sequel to the popular puzzle game where you have to fill different patterns with pieces.

games.name: Super Loom: Dragonscale
games.description: Get creative and weave one of the popular loom bands - this time with the dragonscale pattern! Find the perfect color combination and decorate the bracelet with cute charms.

games.name: Back To Candyland - Episode 3
games.description: Even more candies, more levels, more challenges in the third episode of the Match3 hit series Back to Candyland!

games.name: Fruita Swipe 2
games.description: The sequel to the Match3 hit Fruita Swipe is here and 100 brand new levels are waiting for you! Connect as many fruits as possible and complete all challenges!

games.name: Spect
games.description: SPECT is an challenging and addictive 2D space shooter.

games.name: 123 Puzzle
games.description: Prove your number skills and complete all levels of our 123 Puzzle.

games.name: Super Loom: Starburst
games.description: Create an awesome Starburst bracelet in this colorful new Super Loom game!

games.name: Snail Bob 3
games.description: In this third adventure of the Snail Bob series, Bob is stuck in ancient Egypt. Guide him safely through all levels and help him find his way back home to his Grandpa!

games.name: Heavenly Sweet Donuts
games.description: Serve delicious donuts in this cute time management game and try to complete as many days as possible!

games.name: Pocket RPG
games.description: An exciting adventure is waiting for you! It's a book. It's a game. It's a gamebook.

games.name: Rainbow Star Pinball
games.description: Show your reaction skills in this funny and colorful action pinball game. Discover the secret bonus round, collect as many points as possible and get the highest score!

games.name: Superhero Quiz
games.description: Test your superhero-knowledge on comics, films and series. More than 100 characters provide long fun for young and old fans of superheroes and their supervillains.

games.name: Knightower
games.description: Train your reflexes by helping the little knight to climb up an endless tower. Jump to the platforms at the right and left side and try to score as many points as possible!

games.name: Office Love
games.description: Try to kiss the girl as often and as long as possible while your boss is distracted by the phone! Don't let the boss catch you!

games.name: Piano Tiles
games.description: There is just one rule: Don't touch the white tiles! All this game asks of you are fast fingers and an attentive mind!

games.name: Rabbit Punch
games.description: Rabbit Punch is an addictive arcade game for up to two players!

games.name: Drop Me
games.description: Colorful puzzle, sweet sound, lovable characters and challenges. Have fun with Drop Me!

games.name: Spring Panda
games.description: In Spring Panda you have to help a cute panda jump from pole to pole. Try to get as far as possible!

games.name: Summer Lily
games.description: Lily is on summer vacation and you can travel with her! Pack your bags and create a beautiful summer outfit for her in this new dress up title!

games.name: Snap The Shape: Spring
games.description: Fill out the patterns with blocks in various shapes and sizes in this challenging puzzle game!

games.name: Tea Treatment
games.description: Tea - you can't only drink it, but use it for a refreshing makeover as well! Choose from different tea extracts and start the beauty adventure!

games.name: Traffic
games.description: Help the little chicken to cross the streets, but beware of the cars or it will be hit!

games.name: Animals Connect
games.description: Match animals in this cute Mahjong connect game and try to earn as many points as possible!

games.name: Shopping Lily
games.description: It's time for shopping! Create a perfect outfit in this fashionable dress up game.

games.name: Pilot Heroes
games.description: Play as a pilot and fly exciting missions in this action-packed skill game!

games.name: Back To Candyland - Episode 2
games.description: More candies, more levels, more challenges in the second episode of the Match3 hit series Back to Candyland!

games.name: Sweet Candies
games.description: This colorful Match3 game is the perfect fit for everyone with a sweet tooth! Combine 3 or more candies of the same color and solve all puzzles within the time to reach a 3 star rating!

games.name: Blobs Plops
games.description: Explode blobs, cause chain reactions and score as many points as you can in this fun logic puzzle!

games.name: Beauty Cat Salon
games.description: The cat stylist is in a devilish mood - help her mess up the grooming, but don't let the boss catch you!

games.name: Pet Roulette
games.description: Find out which cute pet destiny has in store for you in this fun animal roulette and dress up game!

games.name: What Does Your Boyfriend Look Like?
games.description: Do you believe in fate? Find out what your boyfriend looks like in this fun game!

games.name: Back To Candyland - Episode 1
games.description: Find at least three of the same-colored candies and remove them from the field. Master new challenges in every level and finish each one with three stars!

games.name: Easter Lily
games.description: It's springtime! Create a fresh new look for Lily in this Easter-themed dress up game!

games.name: Halloween Lily
games.description: Help Lily in this fun dress up game pick a scary costume for Halloween!

games.name: Block Buster
games.description: Try to survive as long as you can in this fun Match3 game. Tap on 3 or more of the same blocks to remove them from the field and make sure they don't hit the roof!

games.name: Twins
games.description: Enter a mesmerising trance of co-dependence in Twins. The rules are simple: control two vessels in sync, survive against all odds and keep calm.

games.name: 0h n0
games.description: Figure out the number of blue and red dots on the field in this minimalist logic puzzle!

games.name: 0h h1
games.description: 0h h1 is an addicting logic game for young and old.

games.name: Dragons Trail
games.description: Move the blocks and solve the puzzle to point the way for the little viking to help him get the egg to the dragon mother!

games.name: Manga Lily
games.description: Stroll around Japan's fashion mecca Harajuku and create some truly kawaii outfits for Lily in this fun Manga dress up game!

games.name: Protect The Planet
games.description: Protect The Planet is a fast paced action strategy game. How long will you survive?

games.name: Save the Date
games.description: Don't let your boss catch you slacking off while you dress up for your hot date after work - or you will get fired!

games.name: Wedding Lily
games.description: Lovely Lily is getting married and you have to help her dress up for her wedding day! Choose from many categories and create the most beautiful bridal look for Lily's big day!

games.name: Fast Circles
games.description: Wait for the right moment to let the ball fall down on the turning circle and make it hit the right color!

games.name: Shapes
games.description: Turn the shapes and make only their counterpart hit them in this challenging reaction game!

games.name: Minimal Dots
games.description: Minimalist but challenging: the dots in black and grey need to be turned to be hit by the approaching dots in the right color!

games.name: 2Cars
games.description: Switch the lanes, avoid the squares, collect the circles and safe your 2 cars to get a high score!

games.name: Domino Shades
games.description: Combine same-colored Domino blocks and remove as many rows as you can in this addictive puzzle game!

games.name: Road Safety - Blood Free
games.description: Help the people to cross the street, but beware of the cars or they will be hit!

games.name: Woblox
games.description: Use your logical thinking and move the blocks, so the green one can follow the arrow into the gap!

games.name: Parking Passion
games.description: Move the car and place it in the right spot as quickly as you can in the new puzzle and skill game Parking Passion!

games.name: 4x1 Picture Quiz
games.description: Look at the 4 pictures and find the word that connects them!

games.name: Logo Quiz
games.description: What brand does the logo on the picture belong to? Make a guess with the new Logo Quiz!

games.name: Sweets Monster
games.description: Sweets Monster is a 2D endless parkour game. The aim is to avoid all obstacles and to gather candy as much as possible to get a high score.

games.name: Timberman
games.description: Train your reflexes by helping Timberman to chop an endless tree. Mind the branches at the right and left side and try to score as many points as possible!

games.name: Sheepop
games.description: In Sheepop you have to help a cute pixel sheep jump from pole to pole. Try to get as far as possible!

games.name: Don't Crash
games.description: Do not crash! This is the only rule of this addictive and fun skill game. Tap anywhere to change lanes and beat as many rounds as possible.

games.name: The Green Mission
games.description: In the platform puzzle The Green Mission your task is to help the green blob Buddy on his journey through an ancient cave. Master all levels and collect crystals to get the mysterious recipe!

games.name: Hextris
games.description: Rotate the Hexagon to prevent the blocks from stacking outside the outer grey hexagon!

games.name: Animalines
games.description: The cute animals are seperated: Unite the pairs and watch them cheer in the puzzle game Animalines!

games.name: Speed Maniac
games.description: Unleash your inner speed freak in this cool drag racing game. Race against opponents, upgrade you car and win the trophy!

games.name: Fruita Swipe
games.description: Connect the fruits by drawing a line between them and fulfill the tasks set in every level!

games.name: Penalty 2014
games.description: Score as many penalties as possible so this time you win the 2014 World Cup!

games.name: Katana Fruits
games.description: Slice the fruits, avoid the bombs and get the high score!

games.name: Super Loom: Triple Single
games.description: Get creative and weave one of the popular loom bands - this time with the triple single pattern! Find the perfect color combination and decorate the bracelet with cute charms.

games.name: Snow Smasher
games.description: Train your reaction skills with this winterly revival of the classic breakout game!

games.name: Nut Rush 3 - Snow Scramble
games.description: In this wintery sequal of the popular jump 'n' run game Nut Rush you task is to help the little squirrel to gather the nuts and get safely to its nest.

games.name: Winter Lily
games.description: Numerous features, countless combinations: be creative and try different looks in this cool Makeover game for the winter season. Dress Lily up, change her hair, and make her shine in the snow!

games.name: Don't Cross the Line
games.description: Master this riddle by uncrossing the lines and solving the interwoven pattern.

games.name: Wake the Santa
games.description: Wake the Santa in this Christmassy puzzle game by eliminating the blocks and making the snowflakes fall on Santa.

games.name: Sort Bird
games.description: Use all your moves to get the birds into their nest. If you are clever enough and master the puzzle game you will win the star in every level!

games.name: Cooking Super Girls: Cupcakes
games.description: First dress the Cooking Super Girl and then help her to bake sweet cupcakes. Use her superpower to make the cakes extra delicious.

games.name: 3 Mice
games.description: Hold the 3 Mice together and move them as deep as you can on the platforms, without them falling off of them. How skillfull are you?

games.name: Red Head
games.description: Move the red ball as far as you can by helping it jump from platform to platform without falling off them or touching the spikes. What will be your high score?

games.name: Burnin Rubber
games.description: Choose your car, choose your weapon and head out to rule the streets. Steer by tapping left or right and burn some rubber.

games.name: Cartoon Quiz
games.description: Are you the greatest cartoon and comic nerd you know? Then prove it with this new quiz game! Look at the picture and type in the name of the famous cartoon character!

games.name: Cute Salon
games.description: The cute manga doll needs a makeover: wash and style her hair and match it with new accesory for different occasions in the Cute Salon!

games.name: Koutack
games.description: Collect all stars while piling up the tiles in this colorful puzzle game.

games.name: Foot Chinko
games.description: Foot Chinko will take you on a football trip around the world. Win all the important cups in this football tournament game.

games.name: Fitz Color
games.description: Train your reactions by tapping the color you can read within seconds.

games.name: Speed Billiards
games.description: Pot as many balls as you can in your limited time and pass each level ith a perfect score! Speed Billiards trains your skills and reactions and strikes with its 3D graphics.

games.name: Super Looms: Fishtail
games.description: Get creative and weave one of the popular loom bands! Find the perfect color combination and decorate the bracelet with cute charms.

games.name: Extreme Kitten
games.description: The adorable kitten wants to jump far: show your skills and help her by finding the right timing for her start and extend it by tapping the items on the playground. Extras and power-ups are available in the shop.

games.name: Let me grow
games.description: Make the flowers bloom by leading the water to their direction. To achieve this you need to use your logical thinking in this new puzzle game!

games.name: Speed Club Nitro
games.description: Collect as many power-ups as possible while racing for the first prize to better your position. Use your prize money to buy upgrades for your car.

games.name: Vegetable Lasagna - Cooking with Emma
games.description: Fot those of you who love lasagna, Emma this time shows you how to prepare a vegan version of the popular dish. In the games of the series Cooking with Emma you can read the whole recipe after having followed the instructions.

games.name: Monsterjong
games.description: In this Halloween version of the classic leisure game Mahjong the tiles come with motives of worms, snakes, monsters and other spooky creatures.

games.name: FreakingMath
games.description: Check the solution of the mathematical problem as quick as you can. The more you solve correctly the better will your high score be!

games.name: Tiny Rifles
games.description: Pick the right strategy to win the war in Tiny Rifles. You can chose different firearms, rifleman and artilleries that will save you from falling in battle.

games.name: Football Players Quiz
games.description: Test your knowledge of football with this quiz game. Guess all the players on the picutres and enter their names beneath.

games.name: Fancy Diver
games.description: Find at least 3 corals of the same color that are chained together to save the Fancy Divers from drowning.

games.name: What Famous Cat Are You
games.description: Just answer the questions by chosing the image that best describes you and you will see, which famous cat resembles you the most.

games.name: Tomato Quiche
games.description: Learn how to prepare Tomato Quiche with this game of the series Cooking with Emma. Follow Emma's instructions and read the whole recipe at the end.

games.name: Fairy Princess
games.description: The Fairy Princess needs an enchanted outfit. Dress and style her by picking clothing items and accesory to create the perfect look.

games.name: Garden Princess
games.description: Create a new look for the Garden Princess while she is sitting on her swing in this dreamy dress up game.

games.name: My Wedding
games.description: Create the perfect bride look for a dream wedding by matching the dress with beautiful accessory and finish it with the hairstyle.

games.name: Beach Beauty
games.description: Dress the Beach Beauty for a perfect summer day. The high variety of clothing items, accessory and hairstyles you can pick from allows you to get creative!

games.name: Roxelane Huerrem True Make Up
games.description: Combine different hairstyles and makeups, as well as crowns and robes for Roxelane Huerrem, the most powerful woman of the Ottoman empire.

games.name: Rosie True Make Up
games.description: It is your turn to create a look for supermodel Rosie! This game of the True Make Up Series keeps a variety of different features ready you can use to change Rosie's hairstyle, make-up and outfit.

games.name: Nina True Make Up
games.description: Actress Nina is famous for her style, but she needs a change. Create a new look by matching clothing items, accessory, make-up and hairstyle with this girls game of the True Make-Up Series.

games.name: Vanessa True Make Up
games.description: Vannesa needs your help with her styling. Create her look by chosing her outfit and hairstyle andt match the perfect make-up and accessory with it.

games.name: Taylor True Make Up
games.description: Become Taylor's personal stylist and pick out of a variety of different make-up and clothing items, haistyles and accessory to create a new look for her, with this game of the True Make Up series.

games.name: Selena True Make Up
games.description: Selena needs a new style and you can dress her, do her hair and make-up complete the new look with the perfect accessory in this game of the True Make Up Series.

games.name: Lana True Make Up
games.description: Singer Lana wants a new look and you can help her with this new dress up game of the True Make Up Series, by using different make-up items, hairstyles, accessory and clothes.

games.name: Kristen True Make Up
games.description: Style actress Kristen by using the different clothing and make-up items, hairstyles and accessory to create a modern, trendy look.

games.name: Kelly True Make Up
games.description: Singer Kelly wants you as her personal stylist. In this game of the True Make Up Series you have a wide range of make-up and clothing items, hairstyles and´accessory to create the perfect look.

games.name: Jennifer True Make Up
games.description: Give actress Jennifer a make-over with this game of the True Make Up Series. Match the perfect make-up and hairstyle with clothing items and accessory to create a trendy look.

games.name: Jennifer True Make Up
games.description: Superstar Jennifer needs a little help with dressing up: use different make-up and clothing items, hairstyles and accessory to create her look in this game of the True Make Up Series.

games.name: Heidi True Make Up
games.description: Heidi needs a new styling and you can create it for her with this girls game of the True Make Up Series. Your implements for this are different make-up and clothing items, hairstyles and accessory.

games.name: Demi True Make Up
games.description: Be a make-up artist and create a new look for Demi with this game of the True Make Up Series. On hand for this are, besides different make-up items, also hairstyles, clothes and accessory.

games.name: Dakota True Make Up
games.description: In this new game of the True Make Up Series, change Dakota's look by picking out of a variety of make-up  and clothingitems and finish it with the perfect haistyle and accessory.

games.name: Christina True Make Up
games.description: In this girl game of the True Make Up Series you need can create a new look for singer Christina by putting together the perfect make-up, clothing items, accessory and hairstyle.

games.name: Amanda True Make Up
games.description: Be a trendsetter and pick the perfect styling for actress Amanda in this girl game of the True Make Up Series.

games.name: Football Tricks World Cup 2014
games.description: Shoot the ball into the goal by determining its shot-strength and angle. Avoid the obstacles.

games.name: Cannons and Soldiers
games.description: Shoot your enemies by determining the strength and angle of your cannon. The less shots you need, the better.

games.name: Chocolate Biscuits
games.description: In the cooking game series Cooking with Emma this time you have to help the lovely cool to prepare the delicious Chocolate Biscuits. At the end you can read the whole recipe and prepare them in real life.

games.name: Basketball
games.description: Score as many baskets as possible and improve your high score constantly!

games.name: Farm Invaders
games.description: In this shoot 'em up game full of action you have to shoot all the ravens to protect your farm and get the high score!

games.name: Beach Sudoku
games.description: Use your logic and solve the popular numbers puzzle Sudoku, by filling a 9x9 grid with numbers so that each row, column and section contain all of the digits between 1 and 9. This beach version will help you have a time out from everyday life.

games.name: Cartoon Flight
games.description: Fly the little cartoon plane as far as you can and in this adventurous distance game, but be careful: enemies and obstacles will get in your way.

games.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
games.description: Help lovely Emma in the cooking game series Cooking with Emma to prepare the delicious Peanut Butter Cookies, and read the whole recipe at the end.

games.name: Wild West Solitaire
games.description: The wild west and card games go together like peanut butter and jelly. Pretend you're in a saloon, sort the cards and clear the field.

games.name: Lily Real Make up
games.description: Get creative and redo Lily's look by using make up products, different hairstyles and finish the look with the perfect accessory!

games.name: Pop Pop Rush
games.description: Chain at least 3 ballons of the same color and make them pop. Longer chains will gain more points and power-ups help you to get a Pop Pop Rush!

games.name: Jewelish
games.description: Move the jewels, match them with their equals and watch them explode. Match 3 at least and more to get more points and activate power-ups.

games.name: Flow Free
games.description: Fill the whole board by matching equal colors. To succeed in every level you need to use your logical thinking.

games.name: Kiba & Kumba: Shadow Run
games.description: In this fun jump 'n' run game you have to help the cute monkeys Kiba & Kumba to flee from Dr.Slipp van Ice into safety.

games.name: Kumba Karate
games.description: Be a karate master with cute monkey Kumba, use all the right kicks, punches and moves to throw your opponent.

games.name: Kiba & Kumba: High Jump
games.description: Jump as high as you can with the adorable monkeys Kiba & Kumba! Collect power-ups to improve your highscore!

games.name: Kiba & Kumba: Jungle Chaos
games.description: Help the cute monkeys Kiba & Kumba to to fight against the evil penguin Dr. Slip van Ice in this jump 'n' run game full of action.

games.name: Fishy Rush
games.description: Guide the little fish through the ocean while avoiding the dangerous enemies, such es the sharl. Collect coins and power-ups that will help you improve your high score.
Use your logical thinking, join the equal numbers and double them until you reach the 2048 tile in this addictive puzzle game!

games.name: Stones of the Pharaoh
games.description: Match blocks of the same color and clear the field. With every klicked block you will lose a life, so prepare a good strategy.

games.name: Smarty Bubbles
games.description: Shoot the bubbles, combine at least 3 of the same color and clear the field. What will be your high score?

games.name: Mahjong Relax
games.description: It's time to relax with some Mahjong! In this classic chinese board game you have to match identical tiles and clear the field to win the level.

games.name: Mini Putt Gem Forest
games.description: 18 more levels to master 18 more holes! How many strokes will you use in Mini Putt Gem Forest, the sequel to Mini Putt Gem Garden.

games.name: Mini Putt Gem Garden
games.description: Pot the golf ball in 18 levels and try to use as little stokes as possible. Can you score a hole-in-one?

games.name: Jelly Collapse
games.description: A new Match3 puzzle is waiting for you to use your logical skills. Join at least 3 jellies and gather bonus points for bigger combinations.

games.name: Fit it quick
games.description: Collect all stars by putting the blocks in Tetris shape in their position, but be quick!

games.name: Love Tester
games.description: You have a crush on somebody but don't know how compatible you are? Enter your names and see if you are meant to be together with our  Love Tester!

games.name: Ufo Run
games.description: Use your skills and reflexes to help the alien through the castle tower and increase your highscore by collecting more stars and covering a greater distance with every game to get to the next level!

games.name: Nut Rush 2: Summer Sprint
games.description: In this sequal of the jump 'n' run game Nut Rush you have to help the squirrel to jump between branches, slide under trees and avoid the hedhogs to gather its beloved nuts.

games.name: Nut Rush
games.description: Help the cute squirrel in Nut Rush to jump from branch to branch, without falling down. Mighty levels will help you improve your skills.
